<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/87dda5f22121633ebc5ff4dc817129a6/tumblr_inline_my13iiaDxo1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p>***** <iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/Kq-eTpqKOIQ" width="420"></iframe></p>

<p><strong>xXLeGoldFishXx</strong> has put out a fun sequel to his 0.22 update song, this one being about all the changes made for the brand new <a href="https://www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/kspstore/index.php?p=22"><strong>0.23 update</strong></a> that went live yesterday. It’s catchy, it’s silly and it tells you everything you want to know about the new update in no time at all. Ready for a sing along about tweakables? Watch the 0.23 update song now!</p>
I knew this was gonna be featured!

Well, I have always thought that kerbals are unified in the creation of a space agency and have thus put all their efforts into it. That would be why they didnt have any cities before ET's came along.
